pageProps.title: Introduction to React Performance Optimization: Why It Matters
pageProps.metaDesc: React is one of the most popular JavaScript libraries used for building dynamic web applications. It provides a declarative way to create complex UIs by breaking them down into smaller components. However, as your application grows and becomes more complex, you may encounter performance issues that can negatively impact the user experience. In this article, we'll explore why performance optimization is essential in React and how you can improve the performance of your application.
